articles.author: Zia Weise, Karl Mathiesen
articles.title: How the EU banished its climate demons and salvaged a weak COP30 deal - politico.eu
articles.description: The Europeans took a stand but struggled to build a coalition to push for more climate action at this year’s U.N. summit.
articles.content:
But the EU also faced a new geopolitical reality in Belém.
